name: Space Debra
description:
Use arrow keys in browser, or touch the left or right side of the screen to steer.

Stay alive for as long as you can! Friendly fire is on, bullets you fire never disappear, and you can't stop shooting. Survive the onslaught of your own creation!

Health pickups spawn every 20 shots and health 1 health. You've got 5 max health, and only the cockpit of the ship takes damage.
